products.name: Autographed picture of the Black Rifle Coffee CEO
description: Are you feeling lonely? Are you sad? Fear not, because coming soon to your desk is your own autographed picture of the Black Rifle Coffee CEO, Andy Stumpf.
Aimed at brightening your day, this stallion of a coffee roaster and wine somelier, will warm your heart as you gaze longingly into his eyes. For the low
low price of $69.69, you too can be on your way to stop being such a bitch. There's no time to waste, get your piece of this dick drawing davinci today!
